languages.text: "Я была при свите владыки, когда Теодора фон Валанциус нанесла ему визит. Не знаю, зачем — да и не мое дело". {n}Идира прищуривается, словно приглядывается к чему-то вдали.{/n} "Я до сих пор помню, как изменились голоса в голове, когда взглянула на нее — чуть не до визга зашлись. Много было за ее спиной... и на пути впереди тоже хватало".

traits.locale_text: "Я была при свите владыки, когда Теодора фон Валанциус нанесла ему визит. Не знаю, зачем — да и не мое дело". {n}Идира прищуривается, словно приглядывается к чему-то вдали.{/n} "Я до сих пор помню, как изменились голоса в голове, когда взглянула на нее — чуть не до визга зашлись. Много было за ее спиной... и на пути впереди тоже хватало".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."
languages.original_text: "Я была при свите владыки, когда Теодора фон Валанциус нанесла ему визит. Не знаю, зачем — да и не мое дело". {n}Идира прищуривается, словно приглядывается к чему-то вдали.{/n} "Я до сих пор помню, как изменились голоса в голове, когда взглянула на нее — чуть не до визга зашлись. Много было за ее спиной... и на пути впереди тоже хватало".

She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯拜访了我当时侍奉的统治者。我不知道她找他有什么事情，反正也与我无关。”{n}伊迪拉眯起眼睛，仿佛在窥视着远方的什么东西。{/n}“我依然记得，当我看着她的时候，我脑子中的声音发生了变化。那些声音几乎尖叫了起来。她身后有那么多东西……前面也有很多。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯拜访了我当时侍奉的统治者。我不知道她找他有什么事情，反正也与我无关。”{n}伊迪拉眯起眼睛，仿佛在窥视着远方的什么东西。{/n}“我依然记得，当我看着她的时候，我脑子中的声音发生了变化。那些声音几乎尖叫了起来。她身后有那么多东西……前面也有很多。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

languages.text: «Theodora von Valancius visitó al gobernador al que servía entonces. No sé para qué y tampoco era asunto mío». {n}Idira entrecierra los ojos, como si estuviera mirando algo en la distancia.{/n} «Aún recuerdo cómo cambiaron las voces en mi cabeza cuando la miré: se pusieron a gritar, prácticamente. Tenía tanto a sus espaldas... y aún mucho por delante, también».
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

traits.locale_text: «Theodora von Valancius visitó al gobernador al que servía entonces. No sé para qué y tampoco era asunto mío». {n}Idira entrecierra los ojos, como si estuviera mirando algo en la distancia.{/n} «Aún recuerdo cómo cambiaron las voces en mi cabeza cuando la miré: se pusieron a gritar, prácticamente. Tenía tanto a sus espaldas... y aún mucho por delante, también».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、当時あたいが仕えていた支配者を訪ねてきたわ。その訪問が何のためだったのかは知らない。とにかく、あたいには関係のないことだったのよ」{n}イディラは遠くを覗き込むように目を細める。{/n}「彼女を見たとき、頭の中の声が変わったのを今でも覚えているわ。その多くは叫んでいた。彼女の背後には多くのものがあった.…そして彼女の前にも多くのものがあった」
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスが、当時あたいが仕えていた支配者を訪ねてきたわ。その訪問が何のためだったのかは知らない。とにかく、あたいには関係のないことだったのよ」{n}イディラは遠くを覗き込むように目を細める。{/n}「彼女を見たとき、頭の中の声が変わったのを今でも覚えているわ。その多くは叫んでいた。彼女の背後には多くのものがあった.…そして彼女の前にも多くのものがあった」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius kam den Herrscher besuchen, dem ich damals diente. Ich weiß nicht, welchem Zweck der Besuch diente, und es geht mich auch nichts an." {n}Idira kneift die Augen zusammen, als würde sie etwas in weiter Ferne betrachten wollen.{/n} "Ich weiß noch, wie sich die Stimmen in meinem Kopf verändert haben, als ich sie angesehen habe — sie haben förmlich geschrien. Sie hatte so viel hinter sich ... und auch so viel noch vor sich."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius kam den Herrscher besuchen, dem ich damals diente. Ich weiß nicht, welchem Zweck der Besuch diente, und es geht mich auch nichts an." {n}Idira kneift die Augen zusammen, als würde sie etwas in weiter Ferne betrachten wollen.{/n} "Ich weiß noch, wie sich die Stimmen in meinem Kopf verändert haben, als ich sie angesehen habe — sie haben förmlich geschrien. Sie hatte so viel hinter sich ... und auch so viel noch vor sich."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Un jour, Théodora von Valancius a rendu visite au dirigeant que je servais à l'époque. Je ne sais pas pourquoi, et de toute façon, ça ne me regarde pas. » {n}Idira plisse les yeux, comme si elle essayait de voir quelque chose au loin.{/n} « Je me souviens clairement de ce moment : les voix dans ma tête ont changé dès que je l'ai vue, elles hurlaient presque. Elle traînait tellement de choses derrière elle... et il y en avait bien plus qui l'attendaient. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

traits.locale_text: « Un jour, Théodora von Valancius a rendu visite au dirigeant que je servais à l'époque. Je ne sais pas pourquoi, et de toute façon, ça ne me regarde pas. » {n}Idira plisse les yeux, comme si elle essayait de voir quelque chose au loin.{/n} « Je me souviens clairement de ce moment : les voix dans ma tête ont changé dès que je l'ai vue, elles hurlaient presque. Elle traînait tellement de choses derrière elle... et il y en avait bien plus qui l'attendaient. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius, o vakitler hizmet ettiğim hükümdarı ziyarete gelmişti. Ziyaretin amacı neydi bilmiyorum. Beni alakadar etmezdi zaten." {n}İdira, uzaklardaki bir şeye bakarcasına gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Gözlerim ona iliştiği an kafamdaki seslerin nasıl değiştiği hâlâ hatırımda. Âdeta çığlık atıyorlardı. Ardında çok şey bırakmıştı, önündeyse onu bekleyen daha niceleri vardı."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius paid a visit to the ruler I was serving at the time. I don't know what the visit was for — and it's no business of mine, anyway." {n}Idira squints as though she's peering at something far away.{/n} "I can still remember the way the voices in my head changed when I looked at her — they were practically screaming. She had so much behind her... and plenty ahead of her, too."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius, o vakitler hizmet ettiğim hükümdarı ziyaret etmişti. Ziyaretin amacı neydi, bilmiyorum. Beni de alakadar etmez zaten." {n}İdira, uzaklardaki bir şeye bakarcasına gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Gözlerim ona iliştiği an kafamdaki seslerin nasıl değiştiğini hâlâ hatırlıyorum. Âdeta çığlık atıyorlardı. Ardında çok şey bırakmıştı... Önündeyse onu bekleyen daha niceleri vardı."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
